name: Global Advocates Foundation
goal: Global Advocates Foundation is an international advocacy non-governmental organization (NGO) that promotes, supports and protects human rights, democracy and sustainable development. We aim at direct assertive advocacy, combined with high-level monitoring and reporting, among the institutions and bodies of the UN, EU, CoE, OSCE and other international organizations, national and local ministries and parliaments, think-tanks, media and other CSOs. We have permanent representatives in Warsaw and Brussels. Our website is www.globaladvocates.eu / Facebook: GlobAdvocates / Twitter: @GlobAdvocates / LinkedIn: GlobAdvocates
interests: Climate Action, Development, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Human rights and democracy related policies (EU external actions)
Development cooperation (EU international cooperation and development)
